short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension captures all user interactions on the website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is part of the Katalon TrueTest solution. Designed for ease of use, it eliminates the need to embed code snippets into your application or make changes to the production environment. With this extension, Katalon customers can effortlessly record tester activities in the QA environment. TrueTest then uses this data to generate a comprehensive user journey map and test cases that reflect the testersâ€™ activities. This streamlined approach ensures you achieve the benefits of an automated regression solution without the need for additional security approvals or development resources.
